news.heading: Adani Group stocks tumble 5-20% on reports of NSDL freezing 3 FPI accounts
news.info: NSDL has frozen the accounts of Albula Investment Fund, Cresta Fund and APMS Investment Fund, which together own more than Rs 43,500 crore worth of shares in Adani Enterprises, Adani Green Energy, Adani Transmission and Adani Total Gas, reports have said..
